section.text: All deadlines for tenants and tenant organizations to exercise rights under this chapter that will occur during a period of time for which a public health emergency has been declared pursuant to § 7-2304.01 ("public health emergency"), are extended to a date 30 days following the end of the public health emergency.

annotations.annotation: Section 701 of D.C. Act 23-247 provided that changes made to this section by D.C. Act 23-247 shall apply as of March 11, 2020.
